spec_data.Name: perl-Lingua-EN-Numbers-Ordinate
spec_data.Description:
There are two kinds of numbers in English -- cardinals (1,
2, 3...), and ordinals (1st, 2nd, 3rd...).  This library
provides functions for giving the ordinal form of a number,
given its cardinal value.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:41:46 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl functions for giving the ordinal form of a number given its cardinal value
